mapper.select: SELECT * FROM stock_view ${search} ORDER BY STOCK_CD DESC LIMIT #{startRow},#{listLimit};
SELECT * FROM sh_view ${sql} ORDER BY STOCK_DATE DESC LIMIT #{startRow},#{listLimit};
SELECT STOCK_CD FROM stock WHERE PRODUCT_CD = #{PRODUCT_CD} AND WH_LOC_IN_AREA_CD = #{WH_LOC_IN_AREA_CD}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO stock VALUES (#{STOCK_CD}, #{PRODUCT_CD}, #{WH_LOC_IN_AREA_CD}, #{MOVE_QTY}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE STOCK_QTY =STOCK_QTY+#{MOVE_QTY};
mapper.update: UPDATE stock SET STOCK_QTY=STOCK_QTY-#{MOVE_QTY} WHERE STOCK_CD=#{STOCK_CD};
UPDATE out_schedule_per_product SET OUT_QTY = OUT_QTY + #{MOVE_QTY} WHERE OUT_SCHEDULE_CD = '${OUT_SCHEDULE_CD}' AND PRODUCT_CD = '${PRODUCT_CD}'
